title: Impact of randomly assigned “pay-as-you-go” liquefied petroleum gas prices on energy use for cooking: Experimental pilot evidence from rural Rwanda
content:
Publication date: June 2024

Source: Energy for Sustainable Development, Volume 80

Author(s): Rebecca Witinok-Huber, Kayleigh P. Keller, Egide Abimana, Cleophas Ahishakiye, Howard H. Chang, Christian L'Orange, Dale T. Young, Daniel Zimmerle, Egide Kalisa, John Volckens, Maggie L. Clark
